meanings.sent1: Following the astanga helps guide practitioners in their yoga journey.
meanings.sent2: Many yogis study the astanga to deepen their practice.
meanings.sent3: Trying to walk the astanga without falling off is like balancing on a tightrope.
meanings.sent4: The astanga is like a roadmap leading to inner peace and self-discovery.
meanings.sent5: The astanga is the foundation of traditional yoga philosophy.

meanings.definition: A form of yoga involving eight distinct practices
meanings.sent1: The astanga combines various techniques for a holistic yoga experience.
meanings.sent2: Practicing the astanga regularly can improve flexibility and strength.
meanings.sent3: Attempting all eight practices of the astanga in one day would be quite a challenge!
meanings.sent4: Incorporating the astanga into your routine can bring balance to your life.
meanings.sent5: The astanga offers a structured approach to achieving physical and mental well-being.

meanings.definition: A type of yoga practice involving breath control and physical postures
meanings.sent1: Breathing techniques are essential in astanga yoga for relaxation.
meanings.sent2: The physical postures in astanga help build strength and flexibility.
meanings.sent3: Trying to do the astanga after a big meal can be quite uncomfortable!
meanings.sent4: In astanga, the breath is like a gentle guide through each posture.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of astanga lies in the harmony of breath and movement.
